python.name: python
python.description: Python is an interpreted high-level programming language for general-purpose programming. Python has a design philosophy that emphasizes code readability, notably using significant whitespace. It provides constructs that enable clear programming on both small and large scales.
python.creator: Guido van Rossum

cobra.name: cobra
cobra.description: Cobras are large and diverse group of snakes. There are 270 different types of cobras.
cobra.location: Africa, Asia and Australia, usually in forests and areas near river.

anaconda.name: anaconda
anaconda.description: Anacondas are the largest and heaviest known snakes. There are 4 types of anacondas.
anaconda.location: Tropical rainforests, lakes and swamps of South America. Anacondas are especially numerous near Amazon and Orinoco rivers.

black mamba.name: black mamba
black mamba.description: Black mamba is one of the deadliest snakes on the planet. Black mamba can survive in different types of habitat: savannas, swamps, forests, woods and rocky areas.
black mamba.location: Eastern and Southern parts of Africa

rattlesnake.name: rattlesnake
rattlesnake.description: Rattlesnakes are easily recognized animals. There are 32 known species of rattlesnakes. Major threats to survival of rattlesnakes are habitat loss and organized killing (extermination) due to fear of these creatures.

boa constrictor.name: boa constrictor
boa constrictor.description: Boa constrictor is a close relative of anaconda. Boa constrictor is known as one of the most beautiful snakes because of its colorful skin with interesting prints.
